thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Ann Laverty
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Ann Laverty

author: Ann Laverty
title: Ann Laverty
text: This is the best store in all of Ireland. The staff are helpful and friendly. They know their job well and can give excellent advice and help. Nothing is too much trouble for the staff in Mc elhinneys. The range of clothing , beauty items, jewelllery and household items is magnificent. If you can't get it in mc elhinneys you won't get it anywhere else. I highly highly recommend this store.
